title: Frontend Developer
description: We need someone skilled in React, JavaScript, and CSS.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Experience with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB required.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Looking for a developer comfortable with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.

title: Data Scientist
description: Expertise in Python, Pandas, NumPy, and machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Must have experience in building apps using React Native and TypeScript.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, and CI/CD pipelines is required.

title: QA Automation Engineer
description: Familiarity with Selenium, Cypress, and JavaScript testing frameworks like Jest.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Strong skills in Figma, Adobe XD, and prototyping workflows. Knowledge of CSS is a plus.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Hands-on experience with Python, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and data pipelines.

title: Cloud Solutions Architect
description: Proficient in designing scalable solutions on AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform.
